title: Some of the things I have done

sections.description: I am a High School Gaduate and was the Head Boy of Curro Bankenveld High School.
I went to the University of Cape Town for 1 year. During the time. I took some courses in Biochemistry and Genetics.
I taught myself full-stack web development with a focus in JavaScript and serverless-based micro-services architecture (Azure and GCP functions).
I started as an HNG intern in July (for 10 weeks) and worked as a core maintainer of one the startups (MicroAPI) that stemmed from of the internship for a 4 weeks after the internship
